explains: vt. 再供……资金；再为……筹钱

sentences.en: A loan was arranged to refinance existing debt.
sentences.cn: 一笔贷款被安排来偿还已有的债务。

sentences.en: To capture his equity, Murphy must either sell or refinance.
sentences.cn: 要获取他的资产净值，墨菲必须出售或重新融资。

sentences.en: The company has more than enough cash available to refinance the loan.
sentences.cn: 公司有绰绰有余的现金再为贷款提供资金。
